student_data.notes: Undergraduate count (625) refers to total declared Concentrators (Juniors/Seniors + declared Sophomores); OpenAI noted 177 newly declared students in the Class of 2027 specifically. Graduate count (158) sums MS in Computer Science & Engineering and MS in Data Science. PhD count (297) reflects total enrollment, while specific Fall 2024 snapshots showed 150.

gpu_resources.notes: H100 SXM Total (448) combines Kempner Institute (384) and HMS Longwood (64). H200 Total (96) combines FASRC Cannon (88) and FASSE (8). A100 counts aggregate Kempner, Cannon, FASSE, and O2 clusters. V100 count (200) is a legacy estimate for the Cannon water-cooled partition, plus verified units in HMS O2.

compute_credits.description: Not searched or found in public sources.

analysis_notes: Ensemble result aggregated from OpenAI, Claude, and Gemini models. OpenAI provided the most granular hardware breakdown across multiple clusters (Kempner, Cannon, O2, Longwood), while Gemini provided higher estimated totals for legacy hardware and total student enrollment.
validation_notes: No changes made. All listed GPU resources appear to be owned and operated by Harvard University. Student data is complete and accurate.
